name: Virtual Villagers Origins 2
description: Craft, build, farm, breed and solve puzzles in a village right on your computer!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1+ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics or Dedicated Graphics Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space
